channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA

item.title: 🔴 15:38 Air alarm to the Chernihiv region follow the following messages.
item.description: 🔴 15:38 Air alarm to the Chernihiv region follow the following messages.#Chernihiv_ex This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
